summary: Uuno Turhapuro finds his doppelganger, Hugo, who happens to be a computer genius. Hugo helps Uuno save his father-in-law's business (and Uuno's inheritance) while Uuno helps Hugo win the heart of the love of his life.
cast: Vesa-Matti Loiri|Marjatta Raita|Tapio Hämäläinen|Marita Nordberg|Simo Salminen|Spede Pasanen|Elli Castrén|Caron Barnes|Pekka Autiovuori|Risto Aaltonen|Juha Muje|Seppo Laine|Markku Huhtamo|Seppo Pääkkönen|Juhani Kumpulainen|Eija Vilpas|Riitta Väisänen|Saila Saarinen|Timo Nurmi|Tapio Pirttioja|Saija Hakola|Pekka Lampela
keywords: 1980s|doppelganger|father in law son in law relationship|nose job|lookalike
title: Tupla-Uuno
